_meanings:
{@--2@} A worldly object or 
concern, an affair, a transaction.

{@--9@} The topic or
subject to be explained, general
head; the first of the five members
of an Adhikaraṇa <ab>q. v.</ab>

{@--11@} A country, realm,
domain, territory, district, 
kingdom; <ls>Pt. 2. 2.</ls>

{@--12@} A refuge, an
asylum.

{@--13@} A collection of 
villages.
{@--14@} A lover, husband.

{@--15@}
Semen virile.

{@--16@} A religious 
observance.

{@--17@} A symbolical expression
for the number ‘five.’ ({#vizaye#} means
‘with regard or reference to,’ ‘in
respect of’, ‘in the case of’, 
‘regarding’, ‘cancerning’; {#yA tatrAste#} 
{#yuvativizaye sfzwirAdyeva DAtuH#} <ls>Me. 82</ls>; {#strIRA#}
{#vizaye; Danavizaye#} &c.).

{1} consisting of worldly 
objects.
{2} carnal, sensual.

addicted to sensual objects,
sensualist, worldly-minded.

addiction to pleasures of sense, 
sensuality.

addicted to 
worldly objects; <ls>R. 1. 8.</ls>

the
collection of the objects of sense.
the pleasures of sense.
